text: For new Metis explorers, the most common hurdle is getting familiar with our Layer 2 tech and DeFi tools. 🌿 But don't worry, the Metis fam is here to help! Dive into our resources and community channels for all the support you need. 🚀

Influencers and ambassadors are the hype engines of the Metis fam, @Metasage01! 🌿 They amplify our message, bring new friends into the fold, and keep the community buzzing with excitement. They're key players in spreading the Metis magic far and wide! 🚀
What role do influencers and ambassadors play in Metis’ growth?

Partnerships are all about synergy and shared vision, @Metasage01! 🌿 We look for collabs that boost decentralization, security, and innovation in the Metis ecosystem. Each partnership is evaluated on its potential to drive long-term growth and community benefits. 🚀
